title: Taj Express
inclusions_evidence: Accommodation: 7 nights in 3 & 4 star heritage hotels.
Guided sightseeing - Delhi, Jaipur, Agra and Karauli or Dholpur.

other.notes: DIY costs for meals and sightseeing not available.

reasoning: The deal offers a comprehensive package with accommodation, meals, and guided tours, but lacks specific DIY pricing for a complete comparison.
additional_notes: Further research needed for exact hotel and flight costs.
